home.title: SeeSharpTools React
home.subtitle: Professional Test & Measurement Instrument Control Library - React Edition

features.title: Feature Modules
features.aiGenerator: Use natural language descriptions to automatically generate professional measurement and control components with AI
features.projectDeveloper: Visual drag-and-drop design for rapid construction of measurement and control applications
features.components: Rich professional measurement and control component library to meet various application needs
features.charts: High-performance real-time charts supporting large data volume display

techFeatures.title: Technical Features
techFeatures.performance: Based on React 18 and WebGL technology, supporting large data volume real-time rendering with smooth user experience
techFeatures.modernUI: Adopting Ant Design language, supporting theme customization and responsive design for various devices
techFeatures.aiDriven: Integrated AI component generator, generating professional measurement and control interfaces through natural language descriptions

components.title: ðŸ§© Component Showcase
components.subtitle: Showcase various components in the SeeSharpTools-React control library, including simple controls, professional instruments, and advanced charts.

performance.tips: Performance Tips: FPS > 50 is excellent, 30-50 is good, < 30 needs optimization. WebGL hardware acceleration can handle large datasets.

enhancedCharts.title: Advanced Charting System
enhancedCharts.description: A modern charting framework inspired by ScotPlot, featuring unified architecture, intelligent data management, and professional instrument themes for superior performance and extensibility.
enhancedCharts.stripChartDescription: Next-generation strip chart components with live data streaming, professional themes, and advanced measurement capabilities.
enhancedCharts.unifiedArchitecture: Unified Architecture: Common base class for all chart components
enhancedCharts.dataManagement: Smart Data Management: Efficient buffering and real-time updates
enhancedCharts.themeSystem: Professional Themes: Oscilloscope, spectrum analyzer, and instrument styles
enhancedCharts.performanceOptimization: High Performance: Data virtualization and optimized rendering
enhancedCharts.extensibility: Extensible Design: Easy to add new chart types and features
enhancedCharts.typeSafety: Type Safety: Full TypeScript support with comprehensive type definitions

professionalInstruments.title: ðŸ”¬ Professional Instruments
professionalInstruments.subtitle: Professional test and measurement instrument control library, including digital oscilloscopes, signal generators, spectrum analyzers and other professional instruments, providing complete mathematical analysis tools including FFT, statistical analysis, and digital filtering functions.

oscilloscope.title: Digital Oscilloscope
oscilloscope.description: Professional digital oscilloscope supporting multi-channel waveform display, trigger control, AC/DC coupling, probe attenuation, with professional measurement characteristics.
oscilloscope.name: Digital Oscilloscope

mathTools.title: Mathematical Analysis Toolkit
mathTools.description: Complete mathematical analysis toolkit including signal generation, FFT analysis, statistical calculations, digital filtering and other functions, providing powerful mathematical computing support for professional measurement and control applications.
mathTools.clickToDemo: Click the left button for mathematical analysis demonstration...
mathTools.signalGenerationDesc: Generate sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, sawtooth wave, sweep frequency and other standard test signals
mathTools.fftAnalysisDesc: Fast Fourier Transform, power spectral density, frequency domain analysis
mathTools.statisticalAnalysisDesc: Mean, variance, standard deviation, skewness, kurtosis and other statistical indicators
mathTools.regressionAnalysisDesc: Linear regression, correlation analysis, curve fitting
mathTools.digitalFilteringDesc: Low-pass, high-pass, band-pass, band-stop filters and custom filter design
mathTools.spectrogramAnalysisDesc: Time-frequency analysis, spectrogram generation, dynamic spectrum display
mathTools.multiChannelDesc: Support 4 channels simultaneous display, each channel independent configuration
mathTools.autoMeasurementDesc: Vpp, Vrms, frequency and other parameters automatic measurement
mathTools.triggerControlDesc: Edge trigger, level setting, trigger mode
mathTools.professionalFeaturesDesc: AC/DC coupling, probe attenuation, bandwidth limiting

technicalSpecs.title: Technical Specifications & Features
technicalSpecs.signalGen: Signal Generation: Sine, Square, Triangle, Sawtooth, Sweep
technicalSpecs.fftAnalysis: FFT Analysis: Fast Fourier Transform, Power Spectrum
technicalSpecs.statistics: Statistical Analysis: Mean, Variance, Skewness, Kurtosis
technicalSpecs.filtering: Digital Filtering: Low-pass, High-pass, Band-pass, Band-stop
